biography: Meike is a champion of transparency in a world of black boxes. As an Explainable AI (XAI) Researcher, her work is dedicated to making the decisions of complex AI models understandable to humans. She develops techniques to interpret and visualize how AI works, ensuring that these powerful systems are accountable, fair, and trustworthy. She is inquisitive, articulate, and passionate about demystifying AI for everyone.
